txt.en: 'Now, my little fellows, where be you a-going to, puffing like a bellows? What's the matter here then? Tell me what's your trouble!\n\n'You need to play the instances? Naught worse that that, eh? That can soon be mended.'
'Well, my little fellows! You shall have your deeds completed!'
Grants completion of deed: Draigoch's Lair -- Discovery
Talk to Javatar to complete Draigoch's Lair -- Discovery
By completing this quest, you will be marked as completing Draigoch's Lair -- Discovery
